metadata.title: CVE-2018-14363 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. newsrc.c does notproperly restrict '/' characters that may have unsafe interaction withcache pathnames.

criterions.comment: neomutt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
